name: Submarine Trash Collector
description: A game about collecting trash from the ocean. Move the Submarine around to collect maximum amount of trash in 60 seconds. This game was made for #TeamSeas. Team seas is a global campaign which aims to remove 30 Million Pounds of trash from the ocean.  Donate to teamSeas here - teamseas.org Controls : W A S D / Arrow Keys - To Move Space Bar - Stop Movement NOTE : This is just a fan made game and I am not associated with the guys at #TeamSeas
